content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position 0,0 to 2,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces producing iron plates:
- Stone furnace at (0,0) with coal fuel, producing iron plates
- Stone furnace at (2,0) with coal fuel, producing iron plates

### Copper Plate Production (Position 4,4)
Single stone furnace producing copper plates:
- Stone furnace at (4,4) with coal fuel, processing copper ore into plates

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position 6.5,11.5 to 12.5,11.5)
Complex assembly line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5,11.5) storing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at (7.5,11.5) moving materials from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5,11.5) moving finished circuits
- Output wooden chest at (12.5,11.5) storing completed electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5,24.5 to -2.5,24.5)
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,24.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting water flow
- Boiler at (-7.0,24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-2.5,24.5) generating power
- Connected electricity pole network distributing power

### Research Facility (Position 0.5,28.5 to 0.5,31.5)
Science pack handling system:
- Lab at position (0.5,28.5)
- Burner inserter at (0.5,30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at (0.5,31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

# ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Selection Errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Verify all prerequisites are met before attempting to research advanced technologies
- Required science packs must be available for the selected technology

### Missing Resource Errors
- Electronic circuit production halted due to missing copper cable ingredients
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials to prevent production stoppages

### Power System Management
- Monitor boiler fuel levels to maintain consistent power generation
- Keep coal supply adequate for all burner inserters and furnaces
